member.summary: Specifies the DbSet type for a property or field.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sqlx.Annotations.ExpressionToSqlAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a parameter should be converted from a LINQ expression to SQL.

member.summary: Marks a class as a repository for a specified service interface.

member.name: M:Sqlx.Annotations.RepositoryForAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: T:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlDefineAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the SQL dialect type for a class or method.

member.name: M:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlDefineAttribute.#ctor(Sqlx.Annotations.SqlDefineTypes)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlExecuteTypeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the SQL execution type for a method.

member.name: M:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlExecuteTypeAttribute.#ctor(Sqlx.SqlOperation)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlTemplateAttribute
member.summary: Mark method to use compile-time SQL template, providing safe SQL concatenation functionality Combined with SqlxAttribute, generates high-performance SQL code at compile time

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlTemplateAttribute.Template
member.summary: SQL template string, uses @{parameterName} as placeholders Example: "SELECT * FROM Users WHERE Id = @{userId} AND Name = @{userName}"

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlTemplateAttribute.Dialect
member.summary: Database dialect type, defaults to SqlServer

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlTemplateAttribute.SafeMode
member.summary: Whether to enable safe mode, defaults to true Safe mode performs SQL injection checks and parameter validation

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlTemplateAttribute.ValidateParameters
member.summary: Whether to validate parameters, defaults to true

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlTemplateAttribute.EnableCaching
member.summary: Whether to cache generated SQL, defaults to true

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlTemplateAttribute.Operation
member.summary: Execution type, used to optimize generated code

member.name: T:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute
member.summary: Specify the SQL command text, raw SQL, or stored procedure name for the method When used with SqlTemplateAttribute, provides compile-time SQL generation functionality

member.name: M:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with stored procedure name

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.StoredProcedureName
member.summary: Gets or sets the stored procedure name.

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.Sql
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw SQL command text.

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.AcceptsSqlTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this method accepts SqlTemplate as parameter. When true, the method can accept SqlTemplate parameter for dynamic SQL generation.

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.SqlTemplateParameterName
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter name for SqlTemplate when AcceptsSqlTemplate is true. Defaults to "template" if not specified.

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.UseCompileTimeTemplate
member.summary: Indicates whether this method uses compile-time SQL template generation When true, will collaborate with SqlTemplateAttribute to generate high-performance code

member.name: P:Sqlx.Annotations.SqlxAttribute.TemplateCacheKey
member.summary: Cache key for compile-time templates, used to optimize repeated queries

member.name: T:Sqlx.Annotations.TableNameAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the table name for a class.

member.name: M:Sqlx.Annotations.TableNameAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Sets SELECT columns using multiple expressions

member.name: M:Sqlx.ExpressionToSql`1.BuildSql
member.summary: Build SQL statement, simple and direct without caching.

member.name: M:Sqlx.ExpressionToSql`1.UseParameterizedQueries
member.summary: Enable parameterized query mode for SqlTemplate generation

member.name: M:Sqlx.ExpressionToSql`1.ToTemplate
member.summary: Convert to SQL template. If parameterized mode is not enabled, it will automatically enable and rebuild the query.

member.name: M:Sqlx.ExpressionToSql`1.ToAdditionalClause
member.summary: Generate additional clauses (GROUP BY, HAVING, ORDER BY, LIMIT, OFFSET).
